name: KEEP PUP!
description:
Created by Team Bird for the 2021 GMTK game jam!

Walk dogs until they are happy, then return them home for money. Don't get fined for letting the dogs run off-leash!

---

Willow Carter- design, code, music
Eliza Schreibman- design, art, sfx
